quote_first: Date of the telegram, Rome, November 24, ten minutes before twenty-three o'clock. The telegram seems to say, "The Sovereigns and the Royal Children expect themselves at Rome tomorrow at
title: Italian Without a Master
author: Mark Twain

quote_last: Behold! I tell you a mystery. We shall not all sleep, but we shall all be changed,
title: 1 Corinthians
author: ESV
